entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Windsor Airport 9:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: NE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
